message.content:
1. The safety of a drug is being evaluated.
2. Adverse events are being evaluated as part of the safety assessment.
3. Vital signs are being evaluated as part of the safety assessment.
4. Physical examination findings are being evaluated as part of the safety assessment.
5. Clinical laboratory values are being evaluated as part of the safety assessment.
6. Electrocardiographic findings are being evaluated as part of the safety assessment.

messages.content:
Statement: To evaluate the safety of the drug, adverse events, vital signs, physical examination findings, clinical laboratory values and electrocardiographic findings were evaluated.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
